name: Bangkok to Chiang Mai by Sleeper Train through the JUNGLE!
description:
Join me in playing TrainStation2 today! Click https://pixelfederation.onelink.me/Aaa9/qbtxk28l to download and use code LUCAS for 10 free in-game gems!

Thailand's Special Express 9 is one of Southeast Asia's most popular tourist trains, connecting the capital of Bangkok to Chiang Mai in the jungle-bound north. I took a ride on their deluxe first class sleeper car, including shower, food, and solo occupancy of the berth all the way to Chiang Mai and I really enjoyed the trip!

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¦ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit
Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit
I made a Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain
Merch store: https://wingin-it.teemill.com/collection/all-products/
Preferred VPN: https://surfshark.deals/winginit - promo code WINGINIT for discount

0:00 Intro
0:38 Krung Thep Aphiwat station - Bangkok's new terminal
3:44 TrainStation2 sponsored segment
4:46 Boarding Thai Special Express 9
6:06 Departure on time 
7:22 Dinner options (don't go for Set G!)
8:19 First class sleeper room tour
9:40 Fares and ticketing - how I booked
10:41 Communal dining car
12:02 Bathroom and shower details
13:27 Early morning, tropical Thailand!
15:35 Breakfast
16:30 Arrival at Chiang Mai, thanks and goodbye!

♫ I use Epidemic sounds; give it a try: http://share.epidemicsound.com/paulwinginit
